hero.title: Your UK Postcode Online.
hero.description: Lcly is a community-built, open source service. Enter your UK postcode to find your community, meet neighbours, and improve your local area.
hero.description_mobile: Enter your UK postcode to find your community, meet neighbours, and improve your local area.

features.title: Explore Communities
features.description: Connect with your neighbors, stay informed, and make a difference in your local area.

vs_nextdoor.title: Lcly vs Nextdoor
vs_nextdoor.description: See how Lcly compares to Nextdoor and why we're building a better alternative for UK communities.

explore.title: Explore All Communities
explore.description: Discover vibrant local communities across the United Kingdom.

developers.title: Developers
developers.description: Join us in building digital infrastructure for local communities. Deploy your own app or contribute to the platform.

ideas.title: Ideas
ideas.description: Vote on features you'd like to see in Lcly or suggest your own ideas.

connect.title: Connect with Neighbours
connect.description: Build meaningful connections with people in your area, organize local events, and help each other out.

news.title: Local News
news.description: Get updates on what's happening in your area, from community events to important local developments.

leadership.title: Community Leadership
leadership.description: Become a community leader and help shape the future of your local community.

democracy.title: Local Democracy
democracy.description: Stay informed about local elections, participate in community decisions, and make your voice heard.

projects.title: Community Projects
projects.description: Start or join in with local improvement projects, from neighborhood clean-ups to community gardens.

safety.title: Community Safety
safety.description: Stay safe and informed with crime alerts, emergency resources, or start a community protection group.

education.title: Local Education
education.description: Find local learning resources, activities, or start a community home schooling group.

charity.title: Local Charity
charity.description: Find help or volunteer at local charities and community support groups.

cta.title: Ready to join the UK Localverse?
cta.description: Find your postcode and meet your neighbours or found your local community.
